name: KOT
tag_list: ricoh, aficio, priport, ricoh-pro, mfp, copier, printer, scanner, fax
overview:
The KOT company is based in 2000, as the specialized company on sale and technical support of office equipment of Japanese corporation Ricoh Co., Ltd.

Since then public institutions and the commercial companies of all branches, embassies and foreign missions, public organizations became our clients.

Now we is the business partner and the authorized service center RICOH in Moscow.

In our range modern digital multipurpose devices, photocopiers, laser printers of various types, monochrome and full-color, for all types of the working groups, large-format copiers and miniprinting houses of global manufacturer of office equipment are always presented.

Advisers of our company competently will help you to orient quickly in a choice of suitable office equipment, will prompt the best ways of its modernization and updating.

The service center of the company has the necessary staff of the qualified engineers for timely repair, preventive, procedural and warranty service of the equipment.
